title: Guitar Lessons - 50 Killer Metal Licks - part 3

Learn To Play 50 Killer Metal Licks


Guitar Lessons - 50 Killer Metal Licks - part 3

Each of the following Sections will be on a seperate torrent:

1. Minor Pentatonic Licks
2. Minor Pentatonic Shred
3. Minor Diatonic Licks
4. Intervallic Licks
5. String Skipping
6. Harmonics
7. 2 handed Licks
8. Harmonic Minor
9. Combining Scales



"This excellent DVD will teach you some of the guitar techniques used by metal legends such as Yngwie Malmsteen, Randy Rhoads, Kirk Hammett and Zakk Wylde that influenced guitarists worldwide!

If you're looking to take your playing to the next level, this DVD will provide you with an arsenal of metal style licks that you can incorporate into your rhythm patterns and soloing!!"
